item.title: Trick convert gif to gif3d
item.description: Trick convert gif to gif3d using Swift Features Simple way to convert gif to gif3d Change background Change size eraser tool How to work Add a layer with two white line on top every frame from orignal gif Try to eraser white line to fix with your gif Combine layers and convert to gif Screenshots Before
